com.kongkongye.spigotplugin.menu.model

Interface ListParamHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuideMenu, MainMenu

    public interface ListParamHandler
    list param handler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListGetter getListParam(User user, java.lang.String data, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> cmdParams, int pageSize, int page, int start)
      get list param
      should return empty list if page exceed the valid range, but total amount should be right.

    • Method Detail

      • getListParam

        ListGetter getListParam(User user,
                        java.lang.String data,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> cmdParams,
                        int pageSize,
                        int page,
                        int start)
                 throws ContextErrorException
        get list param
        should return empty list if page exceed the valid range, but total amount should be right.
        Parameters:
        data - list param handler data, can be empty string but not null
        • if listContext in menu config is 'Land', then data here is ''
        • if listContext in menu config is 'Land:info', then data here is 'info'
        cmdParams - cmd params
        pageSize - page size
        page - page, start from 1, must >=1 (it is equal to start, just for convenience, you can use one of them)
        start - start position, start from 0, must >=0 (it is equal to page, just for convenience, you can use one of them)
        Returns:
        may be null
        Throws:
        ContextErrorException
